has just successfully coordinated heart valve surgery
for a fetus right in the
womb. This is a 32-week-old fetus of
a 28-year-old obstetrician in Da Nang that was
discovered to have many birth abnormalities.  including
no pulmonary valve ostium,
right ventricular hypoplasia leading to a high risk of suicide in
the morning of 3 months 0 Doctors from two
hospitals have supported and concluded that if the
fetus does not intervene immediately to shallow the
pulmonary valve, then  There is a high possibility that the
fetus will die in the mother's womb, but if given
birth, there is a very high possibility that the fetus
will also die immediately after birth due to premature birth
and severe heart disease. Finally,
experts agree on semi-emergency intervention in the pregnancy
to  saved the life of the fetus because the
surgery at two hospitals threaded the needle through the
mother's abdominal wall and uterus and then
through the chest wall of the fetus to the heart. The
final result was as successful as
expected. Doctors will continue to monitor
mother and child to help the mother have a healthy
baby. On the morning of October 5,
Ho Chi Minh City leaders awarded unique bonuses to the
